Uses of Interface
system.DeliveryStrategy

Packages that use DeliveryStrategy
Package
Description
system

  • Uses of DeliveryStrategy in system

    Classes in system that implement DeliveryStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FairOccupationDelivery
    Delivery strategy that selects the courier with the least number of deliveries who is currently on duty, promoting a fair distribution of workload among couriers.
    class 
    FastestDelivery
    Delivery strategy that selects the courier who can deliver the order fastest, based on the total distance from the courier to the restaurant plus the distance from the restaurant to the customer.
    Methods in system that return DeliveryStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DeliveryStrategy
    MyFoodora.getDeliveryStrategy()
    Returns the current delivery strategy used by the system.
    Methods in system with parameters of type DeliveryStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MyFoodora.setDeliveryStrategy(DeliveryStrategy deliveryStrategy)
    Sets the delivery strategy to be used by the system.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Manager.setDeliveryStrategy(MyFoodora system, DeliveryStrategy deliveryStrategy)
    Sets the delivery policy - to assign couriers to an order - in the system.
